Enter the member number from whom you want to share this resource. Click the member icon to view a list of available members.

Enter zero (0) to share this resource with everyone. Enter a specific member number to share this resource with only them. Check the Excluded checkbox to exclude the specified member from this resource.
Click Member to Share.

You can use resources shared by others by adding them to the used resources list below. Everyone in your team will have access to the selected resources. If the selected resource is red, it is not available.
